title._content: Palm Court at the U.S. Grant Hotel

tag.raw: Fred H. Morlan Collection. Morlan enlisted in the Army Air Corps in 1917. He was a pilot and Captain in the Air Service by Oct. 1918. Morlan was reassigned from the 86th Aero Squadron to the 110th Aere Replacement Squadron
tag.author: 49487266@N07

description._content: SDASM.CATALOG: Morlan_00186 SDASM.TITLE: Palm Court at the U.S. Grant Hotel SDASM.DATE: 1918-1930 SDASM.LOCATION: San Diego, California, United States SDASM.ADDITIONAL INFORMATION: pencil on back: ""Palm Court. The Grant, San Diego. Band of French Cruisers [illegible]"" SDASM.COLLECTION: Fred H. Morlan Collection. Morlan enlisted in the Army Air Corps in 1917. He was a pilot and Captain in the Air Service by Oct. 1918. Morlan was reassigned from the 86th Aero Squadron to the 110th Aere Replacement Squadron PUBLIC COMMONS.SOURCE INSTITUTION: San Diego Air and Space Museum Archive
